about__heading.label: About me
about__span.label: Front End Developer
about__paragraph--1.label: I'm a young person who's interested in technologies. I love expanding my abilities and verify them in professional environment. Front End Developer function allows me to meet my advancement ambitions. I can finally treat it as my main occupation.
about__paragraph--2.label: I've began my adventure with programming with courses on Udemy and continued it with Kodilla's bootcamp.

skills__title--rdw.label: Responsive Design
skills__text--webd.label: HTML5 and CSS3 are first languages that I've mastered. I use them without major problems and find a lot of satisfaction with creating complicated elements with SCSS preprocessor.
skills__text--spa.label: Thanks to learning JS6, React, Redux and Webpack I can create applications with S.A.P model. I approach with enthusiasm and fascination to work with those technologies.
skills__text--rdw.label: I'm familiar with Mobile First and Gracefull Degradation concepts and I treat them as natural elements of building modern websites and applications.
